subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Paul Quinn College, an N.A.I.A. men’s basketball squad, took on a top-10 program and lost by 41. Quinn’s coach said the experience was worth it.
snippet: Paul Quinn College, an N.A.I.A. men’s basketball squad, took on a top-10 program and lost by 41. Quinn’s coach said the experience was worth it.
